pages.text: It is time to move on to more serious artifacts. $(br2)As with all staves, the infusing altar alone is not enough to imbue the required power into a piece of wood. However, it can enchant a base that will then be transformed into a real staff and, at the same time, the formidable weapon - Kramer's Torch.

pages.title: Infusion
pages.text: An important note: the infusing of the branch destined to become Kramer's Torch must be performed in the Nether.
